Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our affiliate program

How does the commission structure work?

You earn a percentage of every subscription fee paid by users you refer. Commissions are paid monthly for 12 months after the initial signup, creating a reliable recurring income stream.

When do I get paid?

Payments are processed monthly on the 15th of each month for the previous month's earnings. You'll need to reach a minimum threshold of $50 to receive a payout.

What marketing materials do you provide?

We provide banners, email templates, social media assets, video testimonials, and landing pages. All materials are professionally designed and optimized for conversions.

How do I track my referrals?

You'll get access to a comprehensive dashboard showing clicks, conversions, earnings, and detailed analytics. Real-time tracking helps you optimize your campaigns.

Is there a minimum commitment?

No minimum commitment required. You can start promoting immediately after approval and there are no quotas or requirements to maintain your affiliate status.

How long does approval take?

Most applications are reviewed and approved within 24-48 hours. We'll send you an email with your affiliate dashboard access and unique tracking links.

Ready to Start Earning?

Join our affiliate program today and start earning recurring commissions from Quick Clips referrals.
